lines.text:
[after blasting a Lizard]
I got to get out into the country more often!
There's going to be more of them soon. I suggest we torch the place as soon as possible!
I guess you could say you paid your dues.
I paid my dues. I paid for it in my cat, my house, two goldfishes, and $50,00's worth!
Don't tell me no guns; this is sportsman's paradise!

[to lizards in car]
You *really* disappointed me, you know that?

[after Mrs. Miller is killed]
Not her too. She... was a nice lady!
